summary: A re-skin of the Chitin Armor from the Dragonborn DLC to look like Morrowind Chitin.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]~Requires Dragonborn DLC~[/size][/b]
[b][size=3]The Main File replaces the original Chitin.[/size][/b]

[b]To Do:[/b]
Male & Female Light Set
Stand-Alone - OSMorrowindChitin.ESP - New set will be called \'Strider Chitin\'
More shields. Heavy and light variants of both the Shell and the Tower. I also want to reskin the Chaurus shield because I think it would also fit. I think more choices are better.

It took quite a bit of effort to get the first set done, but the others should come a little easier. You\'ll have to bear with me while I finish the rest. For now you can get a feel for it and know that this re-skin exists. :) I will be updating with the rest soon.

-------------------------
[b]Change Log:[/b]
-------------------------
[b](Planned)[/b] Chitin Weapons? 
--------------------
[b]V1.1[/b] (Pending) - Male & Female Light Chitin Set reskin and Stand-Alone .ESP 
--------------------
[b]V1.0[/b] (Optional File) - Heavy Chitin Shield (Stand-Alone .ESP) (Will be removed when 1.1 releases as it will be included.)
--------------------
[b]V1.0[/b] - Initial Release - (Male & Female Heavy Chitin Set and Shield)
--------------------
author: Cat_Woman1989
